articles.title: S. Korea Urged to Answer Questions about "Forces Following North"
articles.content:
S. Korea Urged to Answer Questions about "Forces Following North"
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued on Monday an open questionnaire demanding the south Korean authorities and the "Saenuri Party" give clear answers in the world's eyes to the  questions about the on-going unprecedented hysteria calling for "eliminating the forces following the north".
					  Dismissing the south Korean puppet conservative group's racket as despicable politically-motivated terrorism against the patriotic forces for reunification and progressive and pro-reform forces and another serious provocation against the DPRK, the open questionnaire noted:
					
					1. Why should those who call for achieving reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification by the concerted efforts of Koreans in line with the inter-Korean declarations be labeled "forces following the north"?
					
					National reunification does not allow classifying Koreans into forces following the north or the south as it is a national cause to be carried out by all Koreans in the north and the south as a driving force.
					
					Is the group going to discuss the issue of national reunification with outside forces, if it is not willing to join hands with compatriots?
					
					2. If those who had contacts with the DPRK and discussed reunification with it should be branded as "forces following the north", how should one call the successive rulers in south Korea who sent a secret envoy to Pyongyang to have a clandestine contact with the DPRK and made donations to its holy places of revolution after touring them?
					
					3. There are many persons who had private contacts with the DPRK in the present Chongwadae, the administration and the "Saenuri Party". Do they have the face to talk about "forces following the north?"
					
					As for Park Geun Hye, she visited Pyongyang in May, 2002 and was received by leader Kim Jong Il. Touring various parts of Pyongyang including the Tower of the Juche Idea and the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, she made not a few "remarks praising the north" and had an in-depth discussion on not only on the issue of north-south relations but on internal affairs of south Korea.
					
					     If all what Jong Mong Jun, Kim Mun Su and others said during their visits to Pyongyang is opened to public, it will just stun all south Koreans.
					
					 The DPRK can make public all what the former and incumbent authorities and "lawmakers" of the south side did and all places they went and all remarks they made while visiting Pyongyang, if necessary. How can they respond to all the disclosures?
					
					4. It is the forces following the U.S., not those following the north, that pose a serious problem in south Korea, isn't it?
					
					The forces following the U.S. have sold off the interests of the nation lock, stock and barrel and zealously followed their master's moves for confrontation and war, bringing unspeakable misfortune and pain to the nation.
					
					    The puppet group is set even to pave the way for Japan's reinvasion of Korea though it is the sworn enemy of the nation, not content with toeing the U.S. line. 
					
					 Does it have anything to say about this?
					
					5. Does not its racket for "eliminating the forces following the north" mean antagonizing and rejecting fellow countrymen?
					
					 Whom does the group want to negotiate with over the issue of the north-south relations and what does it want to solve after declaring fellow countrymen in the north as "enemy" and totally negating them?
					
					 Park Geun Hye and the "Saenuri Party" are taking the lead in the racket for "eliminating the forces following the north". Does not it mean it would opt for a worse policy for confrontation against reunification than the Lee Myung Bak regime once it comes to power?
					
					    The "Saenuri Party" should clarify its stand on it.
					
					6. Is not the racket for "eliminating the forces following the north" hideous human rights abuses?
					
					    Why should those who spoke truth about the north and discussed reunification with fellow countrymen in the north be incriminated?
					
					Even "lawmakers" were labeled "forces following the north" and became targets of "witch hunting" for the mere reason that they differed with the conservative group in ideology. Can there be more hideous human rights abuses than those acts?
					
					7. Is not the true aim of the racket for "eliminating the forces following the north" to create a sense of crisis in south Korea in a bid to stifle progressive and pro-reform and reunification and patriotic forces. Isn't it the ulterior motive to kick up a whirlwind of coloring operation in an effort to turn the situation ahead of "the presidential election" favorable to the conservatives for their stay in power?
					
					 If the "forces following the north" are truly fearful and horrifying, is the present south Korean regime a scarecrow?
					
					 If south Korea is so weak as to collapse right now even under the iron-fist rule of the fascist dictator backed by the U.S., the Lee group had better step down and disappear from the arena of history before it is too late, as demanded by the people.
					
					    These are the solemn questions put by the nation which the puppet group of traitors has to answer before facing a judgment of history.

articles.title: Foreign Delegates, Delegations Arrive in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Foreign Delegates, Delegations Arrive in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Hammam Badr, secretary general of the Federation of Afro-Asian Insurers and Reinsures, arrived here Monday to take part in the Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar.
					 Arriving here on the same day were the delegates and delegations of companies of Russia, Sudan, Switzerland, Britain, Australia, India, Egypt, China and Tanzania.
					
					 Earlier, the delegation of the Kumgang Insurance Co., Ltd. of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan arrived here.

articles.title: National Day of Russia Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
National Day of Russia Observed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Russian ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Timonin on Monday gave a reception on the national day of Russia.
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ki Kwang Ho, vice-minister of Finance, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy took part in the reception.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 On the same day the consulate general of Russia in Chongjin hosted a reception on the same occasion.

articles.title: Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Prize Opens
articles.content:
Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Prize Opens
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The 15th National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Prize opened in the DPRK with due ceremony at the Taekwon-Do Hall Monday.
					 The championship brought together nearly 1,000 Taekwon-do players selected from Taekwon-do teams, schoolchildren's palaces and halls and several units. They will compete in Taekwon-do, go and Korean wrestling.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, Taekwon-do players and school youth and children.
					
					 Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, addressed the ceremony

articles.title: Set of Office Supplies, Gift to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Set of Office Supplies, Gift to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- On display at the International Friendship Exhibition House in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is a set of office supplies presented to President Kim Il Sung by a delegation of the Italian Communist Party in December Juche 55 (1966). 
					 The set includes bookstand, inkstand, pen box, notebook and penholder.
					
					 The members of the delegation prepared the gift with their sincerity.
					
					Every article is covered with quality leather convenient for use and good for health.
					
					 The gift represented their profound reverence for Kim Il Sung, widely recognized as the great leader of the world's revolution and genius of mankind.
					
					 It also reflected their hope that the gift would be used in writing celebrated works to inspire the world's progressives with ever-victorious guidelines.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Assails US Ulterior Intention to Beef up Naval Force
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Assails US Ulterior Intention to Beef up Naval Force
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- U.S. Defense Secretary Panetta at a recent meeting on Asian security blustered that the U.S. would deploy 60 percent of the battleships of the U.S. Navy in Asia-Pacific by 2020, adding that it would keep six aircraft carriers in this region.
					 The U.S. Defense Department worked out a plan for not only increasing the number of the warships in the region but providing the fleets with modern war hardware.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is an anachronistic action against the desire and will of the world people who want peace and stability in this region.
					
					 What is more ridiculous is that he claimed "action of north Korea is making the situation unstable" and cited it as one of the threats to the U.S. while crying out for beefing up its naval force in the region.
					
					 The U.S. feels short of funds under the pressure for cutting down the military spending, but its warlike forces are mulling beefing up their naval force in this region. This shows how reckless they are going in their moves to maintain their hegemony.
					
					 What sounds also ridiculous is that Panetta claimed that such deployment of warships is not intended to blockade the powers in the region but this may be helpful to the development and growth in the countries in the region.
					
					 The arms build-up will certainly arouse great precaution and concern among the countries in the region. Accordingly, no country in the region will remain a passive onlooker to this.
					
					 Given that the U.S. is putting spurs to the reinforcement of its naval force under the pretext of the non-existent threat from the DPRK, it is left with no option but to take corresponding self-defence measures.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korea of Anti-DPRK "Human Rights"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korea of Anti-DPRK "Human Rights"
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Lawmakers from the "Saenuri Party" of south Korea proposed again a "bill on human rights in the north".  This is an unpardonable action to keep the inter-Korean relations indefinitely frozen and bring down the socialist system in the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined commentary:
					 The "bill on human rights in the north" is a very disturbing conspiratorial document to tarnish the image of the DPRK by building domestic and foreign public opinion on the "human rights issue in the north" and realize its sinister scenario for achieving the "unification of the systems" in collusion with outside forces. 
					
					 The passing of such confrontational bill through the puppet "National Assembly" would amount to legally stipulating that south Korea does not recognize the ideology and system in the north but stands in confrontation with it.
					
					 This would put the inter-Korean relations into an unpredictable catastrophe because they have already reached an extreme phase of political and military confrontation. 
					
					 The clan of the party asserted that the "bill on human rights in the north" would help "improve the human rights record" of someone, but their ulterior intention is to do harm to compatriots and justify the policy of confrontation, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the puppet forces kicked off the noisy "human rights" racket, timed to coincide with their campaign for "eliminating forces following the north".
					
					 This goes to clearly prove that their anti-DPRK "human rights" ruckus is nothing but a cheap artifice to dodge various public circles' criticism of them, render society reactionary through their anachronistic "coloring operation" and create a terror-ridden atmosphere of suppression under the pretext of it in a bid to stamp out the progressive pro-reform forces and ensure the stay of the conservative forces in power.
					
					 The group of traitors' anti-DPRK "human rights" offensive would bring it nothing but people's curse and denunciation and a stern judgment of history and the nation.

articles.title: Anniversary of June Uprising in S. Korea Marked: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Anniversary of June Uprising in S. Korea Marked: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday runs a bylined article in connection with the lapse of 25 years since the June popular uprising in south Korea.
					 The uprising was a massive anti- U.S., anti-fascist struggle of the south Korean people to put an end to outside forces' colonial domination and the south Korean military fascist gangsters' dictatorial rule, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The uprising proved once again the historical truth that the struggle for independence, democracy and genuine life is a just patriotic one and the indomitable struggle of the popular masses to achieve them is sure to emerge victorious. 
					
					 Much water has flown under the bridge since the uprising, but the desire of the south Korean people for independence, democracy and reunification has not come true. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors trampled down upon even the elementary successes gained by the south Korean people in their bloody struggle for democratization, bringing society back to that in the past era of dictatorship.
					
					 The Lee group obsessed with extreme hostility and ambition for achieving "the unification of social systems" drove the once favorably developed north-south relations into an uncontrollable catastrophe. 
					
					 The prevailing situation goes to clearly prove that the south Korean people can hardly survive, much less achieving independence, democracy and the reunification of the country unless the Lee conservative group is thrown overboard. 
					
					 All Koreans in the north, south and overseas should wage a more dynamic patriotic struggle for independent reunification, peace and prosperity under the banner of "By the Korean nation itself".

articles.title: Work for Younger Generation Is Important Affair: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Work for Younger Generation Is Important Affair: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- It is the call of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) that all the party members and other working people should devote themselves to the work for the rising generation, not simply expecting happiness at present.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 Love the younger generation. This is a noble banner which the WPK is holding higher in the historic advance in the new century of Juche, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The party, state and society show exceptionally deep concern for the rising generation. A high-pitched drive is now under way to create more good things faster for posterity.
					
					 The greater difficulties the Korean people face, the greater attention they should pay to their youngsters and the more firmly they should protect their destiny and the more sincerely they should take care of them. This is the steadfast stand maintained by the WPK, the mother party.
					
					 The WPK has shown all sorts of loving care for them. This meticulous care reached to all schools, schools of orphans and baby homes across the country and the maternity hospital. It was under this profound care that largest-ever celebrations of the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union were held.
					
					 It has a grandiose plan for the happiness of the generations even 50 years or a century ahead. Gigantic operations are in the making to build monumental edifices at the highest level to be handed down to posterity. Revolutionary changes are taking place in land management including the creation of forests, improvement of rivers, streams and roads and environmental protection. These would be unthinkable without the noble outlook on the younger generation.
					
					 Everything for the rising generation, this should become a goal of all officials and other party members and working people in their life and struggle, concludes the article.

articles.title: Warlike Forces' Preparations of War against DPRK
articles.content:
Warlike Forces' Preparations of War against DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers are busy making preparations of war against the north.
					 It is announced that 210 artillery brigade of the U.S. forces and the south Korean puppet artillery corps would stage a joint MLRS exercise in Cholwon County of South Korean Kangwon Province in the eastern sector of the front on June 12.
					
					 Earlier, on June 6 the commander of the U.S. 8th Army Corps and the commander of the south Korean puppet 3rd Army Corps in charge of the western sector of the front signed an agreement on the boosted capability for joint operation in Ryongin, Kyonggi Province.
					
					 According to this, the war-like forces are planning to wage regular military exercises against the DPRK such as joint live firing and small unit drills.
					
					 Meanwhile, the puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff made an emergency examination for posture of coping with the "attack of long-range guns by the north" among a guided missile command of the ground forces, army corps in the front and units of air forces on the early morning of June 11.
					
					 The warmongers betrayed their ambition for preemptive attack while talking about again the "punishment of someone's base for provocation, support forces, etc."
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers are running amuck in a bid to provoke a war under the pretext of non-existent "threat from the north".

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Denounce Enterpriser Side
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Denounce Enterpriser Side
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and organizations including the metal trade unions under it released a joint statement on June 5 denouncing the enterpriser side for pushing women workers to death.
					 The statement said that a woman worker of the Sam Sung Electronics company died of serious disease on June 2.
					
					 The company clarified that at least 50 women workers recently lost their lives due to industrial disasters, it noted.
					
					 The statement chided the enterpriser side for covering up bad working environment and not taking any measure talking about "business secret" despite the investigation result by a professional organ that cancer-causing substance created in the work process has huge adverse impact on human body.
					
					 It insisted that the business side should apologize to the victims and their bereaved families and clarify the state of the workers suffering from illness.
					
					 Blaming the incident on the "government" which shunned the miserable situation, the statement urged the authorities to take thorough measures to prevent the recurrence of such disasters.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Raps Violation of Freedom of Speech
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Raps Violation of Freedom of Speech
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Jaju Minbo, south Korean Internet paper, lashed out at the south Korean "government" authorities for violating the freedom of speech on the strength of fascist "Security Law" (SL) on June 6.
					 The paper recalled that the broadcasting and communication examination committee in a notice on the results of the examination of the articles of the Internet paper on May 25 pressurized the paper to kill 19 articles.
					
					 The authorities took this action on the charge of the violation of the SL, claiming that those articles praised and introduced the social system in the north, the paper deplored. 
					
					 It expressed its will to stage a vigorous action against the authorities' violation of the freedom of speech.

articles.title: S. Korean Lawmakers Accuse Japan of Moves to Conceal Past Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Lawmakers Accuse Japan of Moves to Conceal Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Women lawmakers from the Democratic United Party of south Korea at a press conference on June 7 released a statement denouncing Japan for its moves to cover up its past crimes.
					 The statement accused Japan of attempting to remove the monument to the comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army in New Jersey, U.S. far from admitting and making apology for its past crimes.
					
					 It termed Japan's statement that it would invest a huge amount of money in return for removing the monument an attempt to cover up its unethical crimes by bribery.
					
					 It urged Japan to make apology and reparation before the world community, instead of imploring the removal of the monument.
					
					 The statement declared that they would demand the "government" urge Japan to immediately opt for settling the issue of comfort women.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Syrian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Syrian Paper
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- A Syrian paper on June 1 carried the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let's Dynamically Struggle for a Final Victory, Holding Aloft the Banner of Songun".
					 The work, published on April 15, 2012, clarifies the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proved the immutable truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and nation.
					
					 It expounds the idea that the ever-victorious history of the Korean People's Army has assured the glorious 100-year history of Juche Korea and that it will provide a sure guarantee for the eternal history of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to demonstrate the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Day Marked in Indonesia, Ethiopia
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Day Marked in Indonesia, Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks and film shows were held by the Diversity Unity Party of Indonesia and in hospitals of Ethiopia between May 25 and June 5 on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 After watching Korean film "The DPRK Says in Bitter Tears", the secretary general of the National Leading Council the Diversity Unity Party of Indonesia said that he could know well about how profoundly the Korean people revere Kim Jong Il, adding that he was, in deed, the greatest man.
					
					 The vice-director in charge of technology of a hospital noted in the round-table talks that the WPK has developed into a dignified invincible party thanks to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He expressed conviction that the WPK would demonstrate its might under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un as it is firmly adhering to independence in politics and enjoying absolute support of the broad popular masses.
					
					 After watching Korean films "The Grand Gymnastic and Artistic Performance 'Arirang'" and "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation", the employees of a hospital of Ethiopia said: Kim Jong Il was a gifted great master of art. Pyongyang of the DPRK will be built into a more modern and wonderful city thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is identical to Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: US Human Rights Racket against DPRK Flayed by Bangladeshi
articles.content:
US Human Rights Racket against DPRK Flayed by Bangladeshi
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, in a statement on June 4  supported the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry denouncing the U.S. "human rights report".
					 The chairman noted in the statement that the DPRK Foreign Ministry laid bare the ulterior aim sought by the U.S. in talking about "human rights issue" and "the issue of people's living".
					
					 He went on:
					
					 It is an inveterate bad habit of the U.S. to use a human rights issue as a political lever for carrying out its strategy for world domination.
					
					 The U.S. persistent talk about the human rights issue in the DPRK is, in essence, a product of its hostile policy toward the DPRK aimed at bringing down the socialist system chosen by the Korean people themselves.
					
					 It is quite natural that many countries of the world are scathingly condemning the U.S. "human rights report" as a dustbin of all distortions and fabrications.
					
					 We fully support the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry, bitterly denouncing the U.S. for malignantly slandering independent countries.

articles.title: Karzai Condemns US Airstrike
articles.content:
Karzai Condemns US Airstrike
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- Afghan President Hamid Karzai in a statement Thursday condemned a U.S. airstrike that Afghan officials said killed 18 civilians, including nine children and four women, according to a report.
					 "NATO operations that inflict human and material losses to civilians can in no way be justifiable, acceptable and tolerable," Karzai said in the statement.
					
					 In the statement he said a thorough investigation of the airstrike would be conducted.

articles.title: Iran Warns Enemies of Threatening Moves
articles.content:
Iran Warns Enemies of Threatening Moves
 Tehran, June 10 (KCNA) -- The commander of the ground force of the Iranian Army on Friday warned the hostile forces of their moves to threaten Iran.
					 The Iranian Army has strength and capability enough to cope with any threat of the hostile forces, he said, adding the army is bolstering its capability to deal with such moves of the hegemonic forces while heightening vigilance against them.
					
					 The army will beat back any enemy invasion and deal more deadly blows at the enemies, he warned.

articles.title: Pakistan Criticizes Panetta's Remarks on Drone Attack
articles.content:
Pakistan Criticizes Panetta's Remarks on Drone Attack
 Pyongyang, June 11 (KCNA) -- The ambassador of Pakistan to the U.S. criticized the remarks made by U.S. Secretary of Defense Leon Panetta that the American drones will continue attacks in Pakistan's tribal regions despite the country's protest.
					 In a statement on June 8, the ambassador said "this kind of public messaging from a senior member of the U.S. Administration is taken very seriously in Pakistan, and reduces the space for narrowing our bilateral differences at a critical time in the negotiations."

articles.title: CRPP publica acta de interpelacion abierta a autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
CRPP publica acta de interpelacion abierta a autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que se torna mas siniestra que nunca la campana de la banda de titeres surcoreanos para la llamada "limpieza de las fuerzas pro-Norte", el Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 11 el siguiente acta de interpelacion abierta demandando a las autoridades surcoreanas y al "Partido Saenuri" dar claras respuestas a la vista del mundo. 
					Esa campana demencial constituye el sucio terrorismo politico contra las fuerzas patrioticas pro-reunificacion y las progresistas y reformistas del Sur de Corea y una grave provocacion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, senala la nota y presenta el siguiente cuestionario:
					
					1. ?Por que se tildan de "fuerzas pro-Norte" las personas que abogan por lograr la reconciliacion, la unidad, la paz y la reunificacion segun las declaraciones conjuntas aprobadas entre ambas partes coreanas y con las fuerzas unidas de nuestra nacion? 
					
					La reunificacion de la patria es la causa pannacional cuyo autor es toda la nacion coreana en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar. Por eso, en esa empresa no puede haber las fuerzas pro-Norte ni pro-Sur. 
					
					Si impiden estrechar la mano con los connacionales, ?sera que quieren discutir el problema de reunificacion nacional con las fuerzas extranjeras?
					
					2. Si son fuerzas "pro-Norte" todos los que tuvieron contactos con la RPDC y debatieron con ella el tema de reunificacion, ?por que no las son los anteriores gobernantes surcoreanos que enviaron en secreto a Pyongyang a sus enviados especiales y  dedicaron hasta los regalos luego de recorrer los sagrados lugares de la revolucion en la RPDC?
					
					3. ?Con que cara estaran hablando de las "fuerzas pro-Norte" si bien en Chongwadae, la administracion actual y el "Partido Saenuri" hay muchas figuras que se contactaron con la RPDC a puertas cerradas?
					
					 En el caso de Park Geun-hye, ella visito a Pyongyang en mayo de 2002 y fue recibida por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Ella pronuncio no pocas "palabras pro-Norte" en su recorrido por varios lugares de Pyongyang como el Monumento a la Idea Juche y el Palacio de Escolares y Ninos de Mangyongdae, y sostuvo profundos debates sobre el problema de las relaciones intercoreanas y hasta los asuntos internos del Sur de Corea. 
					
					Se desmayarian todos los surcoreanos si se dieran a la publicidad lo que dijeron Jong Mong Jun, Kim Mun Su y otros durante sus visitas a la RPDC.
					
					Si fuera necesario, podremos publicar todos los detalles de lo que hicieron, recorrieron y dijeron en Pyongyang las autoridades anteriores y actuales y los parlamentarios del Sur de Corea. ?Como piensan responder entonces?
					
					4. El problema mas serio en el Sur de Corea no es la tendencia "pro-Norte" sino la pronorteamericana. ?No lo es acaso?
					
					Las fuerzas proyanquis del Sur de Corea vendieron en bandeja los intereses nacionales a las fuerzas extranjeras y se pusieron al frente de la campana belica y conflictiva de su amo causando indecibles sufrimientos y desgracias a toda la nacion. 
					
					Como si eso fuera poco, la banda de titeres surcoreanos pretende introducir hasta Japon, enemigo jurado de la nacion coreana, para abrirle el paso a la nueva agresion. 
					
					?Tendran algo que decir de ello?
					
					5. ?No es para hostilizar y negar a los connacionales la campana de "purga de las fuerzas pro-Norte"?
					
					Si declaran a la connacional RPDC como "enemiga" y la niegan totalmente, ?con quien y como querran manejar las relaciones Norte-Sur?
					
					Al frente de la referida campana estan Park Geun-hye y el "Partido Saenuri". Este hecho demuestra que si ellos toman el poder, recrudeceran mas que el "poder" de Lee Myung Bak la politica conflictiva anti-reunificacion.
					
					El "Partido Saenuri" debe exponer claro su posicion al respecto.
					
					6. ?No es una violacion flagrante de DDHH la campana en cuestion?
					
					?Por que se penalizan a las personas que hablaron de la realidad del Norte y discutieron el problema de reunificacion con los compatriotas y hermanos nortenos?
					
					Son blancos de la campana de "purga de fuerzas pro-Norte" por el estilo de la "caza de brujas" hasta los diputados a la "Asamblea Nacional" por la unica razon de tener diferente ideal al de la banda de conservadores surcoreanos. !Que flagrante y brutal es esta violacion de DDHH!
					
					7. La polemica campana persigue el objetivo de aplastar a las fuerzas progresistas y reformistas y a las patrioticas pro-reunificacion al crear el sentido de emergencia en el interior del Sur de Corea y favorecer a la retoma del poder de los conservadores la situacion de "elecciones presidenciales" mediante la ola de represion justificada con la doctrina de colores. ?No lo es acaso?
					
					Si las fuerzas "pro-Norte" son realmente inquietantes y horrorosas, ?sera el actual "poder" surcoreano un espantapajaros que se cae por un halito de viento?
					
					Si es verdad que el Sur de Corea esta a punto de derrumbarse pese a la proteccion de EE.UU. y la dominacion de garrote basada en la dictadura fascista, seria conveniente que las autoridades surcoreanas renuncien el poder segun la demanda de la poblacion y se desaparezcan por el callejon de la historia. 
					
					El presente cuestionario deviene severa advertencia de toda la nacion a que debe responder sin falta la banda de titeres surcoreanos sometida al juicio de la historia.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim llama al aumento de produccion de abonos
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim llama al aumento de produccion de abonos
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Choe Yong Rim visito el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung para averiguar en el terreno el estado de su funcionamiento.
					 Los obreros de Namhung registran auge en la produccion con la decision de contribuir al aumento de la produccion de cereales en este ano al suministrar al campo socialista mucho mas abonos en acato al legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Despues de recorrer varios puntos de la empresa, el premier convoco una reunion de consulta.
					
					 En la ocasion fueron discutidos las medidas y remedios para normalizar en alto nivel la produccion de abonos y terminar cuanto antes la construccion de nuevos procesos en el complejo donde estan grabadas las hazanas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Se dio enfasis en avivar las llamaradas de la revolucion industrial del nuevo siglo y las de Hamnam para recompensar la confianza y esperaza del Partido del Trabajo de Corea con altos resultados de produccion.
					
					 Choe encomendo a los funcionarios atender bien la vida de la clase obrera apreciada por el PTC.
					
					 Con anterioridad, el estuvo en el Bano Publico No.1 de la ciudad de Pyongyang en plena reconstruccion.
					
					 Ese establecimiento publico permite conocer que el Presidente Kim Il Sung presto profunda atencion a la vida del pueblo a pesar de las tremendas dificultades del periodo posbelico.
					
					 Recorriendo varios puntos, Choe destaco la necesidad de satisfacer los requisitos plasticos y artisticos en la reconstruccion observando el principio de asegurar con preferencia el confort del pueblo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela intento de aumento de fuerzas navales de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela intento de aumento de fuerzas navales de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ACNC) -- En la reciente reunion de seguridad de Asia, el secretario de Defensa norteamericano Panetta dijo que concentraria hasta el 2020 en la region de Asia-Pacifico el 60% de los buques de guerra de las fuerzas navales norteamericanas y dio publicidad de que mantendria en esta zona 6 portaaviones.
					Ademas de incrementar el numero de los buques de guerra en esta region, el Departamento de Defensa norteamericano tiene establecido el plan de ofrecerles los equipos modernos.
					
					Esto es una conducta anacronica opuesta a la voluntad y el anhelo de los pueblos del mundo que aspiran a la paz y la estabilidad en esta region.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este lunes y continua:
					
					Panetta dijo absurdamente que "la accion del Norte de Corea hace inestable la situacion ", lo que es una de las amenazas que sufre EE.UU.
					
					A pesar de que sigue careciendo de fondos por la presion de disminucion del gasto para la defensa nacional, las fuerzas belicistas norteamericanas intentan fortalecer en la region de Asia-Pacifico sus fuerzas navales, lo cual muestra como ellas se esfuerzan por mantener la heguemonia.
					
					Lo ridiculo es que Panetta dijo que la reubicacion de sus fuerzas navales en esta region no es para bloquear a las potencias de esta zona y esto es compatible con el desarrollo e incremento de los paises regionales.
					
					Esto alboroto de aumento de las fuerzas navales de EE.UU. provocara la vigilancia y la preocupacion de los paises de la region del Pacifico y ningun pais estara con los brazos cruzados.
					
					Frente al aumento de las fuerzas navales norteamericanas bajo el pretexto de la "amenaza" de la RPDC, esta no puede menos de tomar las merecidas medidas autodefensivas.

articles.title: Minju Joson se refiere a "caso de espia" de la policia surcoreana
articles.content:
Minju Joson se refiere a "caso de espia" de la policia surcoreana
Pyongyang, 11 de junio (ACNC) -- Hace unos dias, la policia surcoreana anuncio que descubrio y detuvo a los "agentes" que entregaron a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea las informaciones referentes a los secretos militares, incluyendo el dispositivo perturbador de ondas de GPS. Segun ello, el fulano Ri, representante de una compania comercial procedente de ex presos de largas condenas no abjurados, y el zutano Kim, compatriota en Nueva Zelanda, recibieron en Dandung de China "ordenes de un cuarenton estimado como agente norcoreano" y coleccionaron las informaciones poniendo en contactos con los ex relacionados de las empresas de defensa nacional.
					En su cometario individual insertado la vispera, el periodico Minju Joson revelo que es una farsa torpe el "caso de espias", publicado por la policia titeres y transmitido por medios de prensa conservadores, y prosiguio:
					
					Hasta las personalidades de alto rango de la capa militar negaron tal "caso" inventado con desmano por la policia titere, con lo cual sufrieron una verguenza ante los pueblos del mundo la policia, que se presumia del descubrimiento de los "agentes" al detener a los inocentes, y los medios de prensa conservadores, que se entregaban a la demagogia.
					
					Cada vez que pasaban por la extremada crisis de gobernacion, los dictadores rechazados por el pueblo siempre fabricaron los casos impactos tales como los "casos de espia".
					
					Ya es conocido por todo el mundo que Syngman Rhee, Park Chung Hee y Chun Doo Hwan buscaron su salida de la crisis de gobernacion en inventar sucesivamente los "casos de espias" e intensificar las represiones fascistas.
					
					Lo insoslayable es que la banda traidora los fabrico coincidiendo con sus maniobras para "exterminar a las fuerzas pro-Norte".
					
					Es natural que esta horda, que sufrio una tremenda pena por la fabricacion de los presentes "casos de espia", invente otros complots mas taimados.
					
					La realidad de hoy del Sur de Corea demanda a las fuerzas progresistas y habitantes elevar la vigilancia ante la invencion de los casos intrigantes de la banda traidora y con las fuerzas unidas frustrar su ofensiva de "teoria  de colores" y su maniobra para "exterminar a las fuerzas pro-Norte".
